fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him

info: Father of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr and the first caliph in Islam
The second caliph in Islam
Brother of Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar, another wife of the Prophet ﷺ
A child companion who befriended, served, and observed the Prophet ﷺ since the Hijrah, when he was 10 years old, and grew up to be a prominent narrator of hadith
Brother of Ramlah Umm Ḥabībah bint Abi Sufyān

fullname: Jābir ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿAmr ibn Thaʿlabah
searchname: Jabir ibn Abdullāh ibn Amr ibn Thalabah

info: Companion of the Prophet ﷺ and husband of Umm ad-Dardāʿ
Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daughter of Abi Bakr, the first caliph
Wife of the Prophet ﷺ and daughter of ʿUmar, the second caliph

fullname: Hind bint Abi Umayyah ibn al-Mughīrah
searchname: Umm Salamah Hind bint Abi Umayyah ibn al-Mughīrah
info: Wife of the Prophet Muḥammad ﷺ
Wife of the Prophet ﷺ who was divorced from Zayn ibn al-Ḥārithah

fullname: Umm al-Muʿminīn Umm Ḥabībah Ramlah bint Abi Sufyān
searchname: Umm Ḥabībah Ramlah bint Abi Sufyan
info: Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daught of Abi Sufyān
Daughter of the Prophet and step-daughter of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

Companion of the Prophet ﷺ and famous for having married 3 prominent male companions at 3 different times: Jaʿfar ibn Abi Ṭālib, then when he died, Abu Bakr as-Siddīq, and when he died, ʿAli ibn Abi Ṭālib.
Sister of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: Nasībah bint al-Ḥārith Umm ʿAṭiyyah al-Anṣāriyyah
searchname: Nasibah bint al-Harith Umm Atiyyah al-Ansariyyah
info: She helped wash the body of Zaynab, the daughter of the Prophet ﷺ, when she died, and participated in several battles alongside the Prophet ﷺ.

Companion of the Prophet ﷺ, an Anṣāri woman known as Khaṭībat al-Nisāʾ, or the Speaker of the Women, due to her outspokenness and eloquence. She also participated in battles with the Prophet ﷺon multiple occasions
Nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
